page.title: 11MY HOTEL
page.content: We own a hotel in which we have seven bedrooms,a dinning room,a lounge in which we can sit and a lounge in which the guests sit. One of the rooms has a shower,toilet and basin. All of the other rooms have just a basin. All of the rooms have tea making facilities in which they have a kettle,tea pot, packets of coffee and coffee compliment,packets of sugar and tea bags. We have one lady who helps called Hetty. She serves in the morning and helps chambermaid around the hotel.I help on weekends,on Saturdays we're really busy and Hetty has a day off on Sunday. Breakfast starts at 9am during the week and 8.30 on saturday. The evening meal is served at 6pm. It consists of a starter,soup,main meal, dessert and cheese. M.DRUCE 2F1
